perturbation.original_text: 1. Engagement. ESSI engages Talent and Talent hereby accepts the engagement to act as a Spokesperson for ESSI, and to provide his endorsement of all ESSI products and services, domestically and worldwide.
perturbation.changed_text: 1. Engagement. ESSI engages Talent and Talent hereby accepts the engagement to act as a Brand Ambassador for ESSI, and to provide his endorsement of all ESSI products and services, domestically and worldwide.
perturbation.explanation: The term 'Spokesperson' is replaced with 'Brand Ambassador'. While seemingly synonymous, the specific duties of each role are not defined, potentially leading to disputes regarding Talent's required activities. This introduces uncertainty in enforcement as the expected level of engagement may differ depending on the interpretation of the role.

perturbation.original_text:
4. Duties of Talent and Rights of ESSI. During the Term and subject to the limitations set forth in Paragraphs 9 and 10, Talent agrees to provide ESSI with the following:

A. Upon request by ESSI, two (2) production sessions to be used for the production of the various medias to be used in Commercial placements ("Production Sessions"); the location, date and time of the Production Sessions shall be mutually agreed upon by Talent and ESSI. In the event any Production Session exceeds eight (8) hours in duration ESSI and Talent will negotiate in good faith additional compensation to Talent for time in excess of eight (8) hours.

B. Talent will serve as a Special Advisor to ESSI, whose sole responsibility is to be listed as a brand ambassador on the Websites and/or ESSI related press releases. With respect to Talent's position as Special Advisory, Talent will not be responsible for any additional services such as attending meetings, corporate functions, etc.
perturbation.changed_text:
4. Duties of Talent and Rights of ESSI. During the Term and subject to the limitations set forth in Paragraphs 9 and 10, Talent agrees to provide ESSI with the following:

A. Upon request by ESSI, two (2) production sessions to be used for the production of the various medias to be used in Commercial placements ("Production Shoots"); the location, date and time of the Production Shoots shall be mutually agreed upon by Talent and ESSI. In the event any Production Shoot exceeds eight (8) hours in duration ESSI and Talent will negotiate in good faith additional compensation to Talent for time in excess of eight (8) hours.

B. Talent will serve as a Special Advisor to ESSI, whose sole responsibility is to be listed as a spokesperson on the Websites and/or ESSI related press releases. With respect to Talent's position as Special Advisory, Talent will not be responsible for any additional services such as attending meetings, corporate functions, etc.
perturbation.explanation: The term 'Production Sessions' is interchanged with 'Production Shoots', and 'brand ambassador' is replaced with 'spokesperson.' The interchangeability of the terms introduces ambiguity regarding the specific scope of Talent's involvement and the nature of the required media productions. The contract does not define what is expected for the shoot, causing different interpretations of the talent's required activities, leading to potential disputes.

perturbation.original_text:
5. Consideration. As consideration for Talent's services under this Agreement, ESSI agrees as follows:

A. Equity Payment: ESSI will provide Talent with one-million (1,000,000) shares of restricted common stock issued within ten business days of execution of this Agreement.   B. Cash Payments:

(1) ESSI will provide monthly payment of Ten Thousand and NO/100 Dollars ($10,000) made payable to Talent for Talent's social communications with its followers on popular social media venues, including, but not limited to, Facebook, Instagram, Twitter and Snap Chat where Talent may communicate about the ESSI product suite ("Social Communication"). The monthly Social Communication schedule will be mutually agreed upon by Talent and ESSI one month in advance of the actual month of communications. Once the monthly Social Communication schedule is set, the volume of Posts, Tweets and Snaps will determine the total amount of monthly compensation available to Talent. ESSI's Social Media Manager will keep track of Talent's activity pursuant to ESSI's Company quarter to determine the amount of Cash Payment due for the quarter.
perturbation.changed_text:
5. Consideration. As consideration for Talent's services under this Agreement, ESSI agrees as follows:

A. Equity Payment: ESSI will provide Talent with one-million (1,000,000) shares of restricted common stock issued within ten business days of execution of this Agreement.   B. Monetary Payments:

(1) ESSI will provide monthly payment of Ten Thousand and NO/100 Dollars ($10,000) made payable to Talent for Talent's social communications with its followers on popular social media venues, including, but not limited to, Facebook, Instagram, Twitter and Snap Chat where Talent may communicate about the ESSI product suite ("Social Media Activity"). The monthly Social Media Activity schedule will be mutually agreed upon by Talent and ESSI one month in advance of the actual month of communications. Once the monthly Social Media Activity schedule is set, the volume of Posts, Tweets and Snaps will determine the total amount of monthly compensation available to Talent. ESSI's Social Media Manager will keep track of Talent's activity pursuant to ESSI's Company quarter to determine the amount of Monetary Payment due for the quarter.
perturbation.explanation: The term 'Cash Payments' is replaced with 'Monetary Payments', and 'Social Communication' is replaced with 'Social Media Activity.' Although intended to describe the same thing, changing to 'Monetary Payments' and 'Social Media Activity' creates room for disputes over what qualifies for monetary payment, as other forms of compensation could be misinterpreted as fulfilling this obligation. Similarly, using 'Social Media Activity' rather than 'Social Communication' can broaden or narrow the expected scope of Talent's responsibilities.
